document_data.name: Orem Arvaeyn
document_data.mainbody: '''Orem Arvaeyn''' was a ''kanqat'' of the [[Vale Guard]] that protected the city of [[Evereska]] and the [[Evereska Vale]] during the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: He had a severe look about him and spoke in the serious manner befitting a guardsman or soldier.
document_data.Personality: Orem possessed some wisdom during his years and made a habit of offering thoughtful insight to his friends.
document_data.Relationships: He was on good terms with [[Galaeron Nihmedu]], a patrol leader of the Evereskan [[Tomb Guard]]. The pair had graduated together at Evereska's [[Academy of Arms]].
